tourDestinations.name: COX'S BAZAR
tourDestinations.description: An iconic symbol of France, offering panoramic views of COX'S BAZAR.

attractions.name: Louvre Museum
attractions.description: The world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa and many other masterpieces.

tourDestinations.name: SREEMANGAL
tourDestinations.description: Famous for its thousands of red torii gates leading up the mountain.

attractions.name: Kinkaku-ji
attractions.description: The Golden Pavilion, a Zen Buddhist temple covered in gold leaf.

tourDestinations.name: SUNDARBAN
tourDestinations.description: A symbol of freedom and democracy, located on Liberty Island.

attractions.name: Central Park
attractions.description: A large public park in the center of Manhattan, offering various recreational activities.

tourDestinations.name: Cape Town

attractions.name: Table Mountain
attractions.description: A flat-topped mountain offering stunning views of the city and ocean.

attractions.name: Robben Island
attractions.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its prison where Nelson Mandela was held.

tourDestinations.bestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

tourDestinations.name: Sydney

attractions.name: Sydney Opera House
attractions.description: A world-renowned architectural masterpiece hosting various performances.

attractions.name: Bondi Beach
attractions.description: A famous beach known for its golden sands and great surfing conditions.
